member.name: T:MetalWeightCalculator.RectangularPipe
member.summary: Calculating the weight or length of a rectangular pipe made of different metals (steel pipes, stainless steel, copper, etc.).

member.name: M:MetalWeightCalculator.RectangularPipe.CalculateWeight(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the weight of a rectangular pipe.
member.param: Profile dimension A or side A size in millimetre.
Profile dimension B or side B size in millimetre.
Density of the metal from which the rectangular pipe is made in g/cm³.
member.returns: Weight of a rectangular pipe in kg.

member.name: M:MetalWeightCalculator.RectangularPipe.CalculateLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the length of a rectangular pipe.
member.param: Profile dimension A or side A size in millimetre.
Profile dimension B or side B size in millimetre.
Density of the metal from which the rectangular pipe is made in g/cm³.
member.returns: Lenght of a rectangular pipe in millimetre.
